description.value:
Class Skills: An oracle with the stone mystery adds Appraise, Climb, Intimidate, and Survival to her list of class skills.

Bonus Spells:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.fv9mgob508qv99zz]{Magic Stone} (2nd),
